Which of the following statements are correct about an array?
options: The array int num[26]; can store 26 elements.
The expression num[1] designates the very first element in the array
It is necessary to initialize the array at the time of declaration.
The declaration num[SIZE] is allowed if SIZE is a macro.
answer: The array int num[26]; can store 26 elements.
The declaration num[SIZE] is allowed if SIZE is a macro.

Which of the following statements is correct?
options: Base class pointer cannot point to derived class.
Derived class pointer cannot point to base class.

subjectDetail.question: Which of the following concepts means determining at runtime what method to invoke?
Which of the following is correct about function overloading?
options: The types of arguments are different.
The order of argument is different.
The number of argument is same.
The types of arguments are same.
answer: The types of arguments are different.
The order of argument is different.
